effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.x_y: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
